org.eclipse.jetty.websocket

Class WebSocketBuffers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.WebSocketBuffers

  • public class WebSocketBuffers
extends Object
    The WebSocket Buffer Pool. The normal buffers are byte array buffers so that user processes can access directly. However the generator uses direct buffers for the final output stage as they are filled in bulk and are more efficient to flush.
